lines.text:
[about a necklace]
If a man ever bought that for me, not only would I have sex with him, but I would *enjoy* it!

All I know about are people fucking their way to the movies, and popping pills and ending up in the gutter. All I know about are aging stars, hopeful whores and cheap studs. All I know about are tits, ass and the truth... and nobody writes books about that.
You're a tight-ass and a smart cookie, but are you my friend?
It's not a book anymore. It's a bestseller.
These women are animals! If my daughter acted like that, I would strangle her with my bare hands!
I think it is the greatest book ever written.
